thread.section_title: Dive Right In Scuba Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dive Right In Scuba | www.diverightinscuba.com
thread.title: Brenda Rice
thread.title_full: Dive Right In Scuba reviewed by Brenda Rice

author: Brenda Rice
title: Brenda Rice
text: I ordered the DiveRite dive fins. I wear a women's size 7.5 (US) shoe and the sizing chart recommended a "M" fin. I even went on the chat with someone on the website and she asked if I was wearing booties with the fins. Yes. She replied "definitely medium" on the fin size. They are way too big, even with rock booties on. A small would probably have been the right size.
